name: Power League IV
overview: Power League 4 is the fourth of five Power League games for the PC Engine, published by Hudson Soft. Originally released in 1991, the PC Engine version would later be added to two digital storefronts: the Wii's Virtual Console library in 2007 and PSN's "PC Engine Classics" range in 2009. Power League 4 adds mostly cosmetic changes to the series. These include new animations for the scoreboards and nighttime variants of its four baseball stadiums. The pitching was modified slightly as well.
